Please, meet Kiln specification -- a lean meta-spec for a pre-production sprint of the Merge https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/kiln-spec. Happy coding!

Note that Engine API Auth is expected to be merged soon and will be included in the updated version of the Kiln spec.
